postalCode.description: Represents the postal code or US ZIP code.

Card processing provider, maps to Fortress.Core.Domain.Models.Entities.FundsStorages.ExternalAccounts.ExternalAccountProviderSpecific.
Is part of Fortress.Core.Domain.Models.Entities.IntegrationServiceProvider.

useIsa.description: Gets or sets the use ISA flag.

purposeOfPayment.description: Gets or sets the purpose of payment.

CreateSubAccountPaymentRequestModel.description: Create sub account payment request model

CustodialAccountsProvider.description:
Custodial accounts provider, defines type of Fortress.Core.Domain.Models.Entities.FundsStorages.CustodialAccounts.CustodialAccountProviderSpecific.
Is part of Fortress.Core.Domain.Models.Entities.IntegrationServiceProvider.

createdAtUtc.description: Custodial account creation date and time.

encodedEndpointIds.description: Identifiers of enabled endpoints in base64 string

endpointPath.description: The endpoint path that permission is regulated

EndpointAccessPermissionTreeNodesRespons.description: The node of permission tree response model

endpointPath.description: The endpoint path that is permission regulated

EndpointPermissionTreeNode.description: The node of permission tree for middleware use
